Key Match Events: Kylian Mbappé scored a penalty to level the match at 1-1
Robert Lewandowski scored a penalty to take the lead for Poland
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps expressed satisfaction despite not winning the group
Michał Probierz thanked the fans and expressed disappointment at elimination
Miscellaneous Highlights: Łukasz Skorupski made six excellent saves for Poland
Antoine Griezmann came on to make his 33rd appearance in a major finals
Others: France finished second in Group D and will play the runner-up of Group E in the round of 16
The match was played in Germany
